title: Account gets banned for 3rd party Please help.
body:
So my account in oce server - name of account : Enforcer 
I've sent many tickets talking to the person and idk how my account got banned i've never used 3rd party. Please help me this account meant a lot to me and its caused me to go in a slow depression for the last few months. I spent a lot of time playing league of legends and having that taken away has broken me.

replies.body:
The below are the common reasons on why people get 3rd party banned:

* Used a script
* let someone use your account who used a script
* Using macros that make your click speed greater than regular
* Using a "skin overlay" that has (hidden) gameplay advantages
* Logged into a computer that had a script

If you did any of that (and only you know deep down you did), then there is nothing you can do.

If you didn't do that, you can send a ticket to https://support.riotgames.com and ask them to connect you to the fraud department and check for unauthorized access.

Keep in mind that there is no point in lying to them. They can see through that easily.

so i can't use razor macros?

Did you buy this account? If so, it may have been leveled using a bot, which is bannable. Also, buying an account is considered sharing an account as you aren't the original owner, which is bannable.

Did you get your account boosted? If so, the booster may have used scripts. Also, sharing accounts with a boosting service is bannable.

Did you share your account? Someone who played your accounts may have used scripts. Also, sharing accounts with anyone in general is bannable.
We cant do anything for you. The support is your only option. Riot only bans if they are sure.

Idk they have some way of looking what interferes with league or something. They cant tell any further information or otherwise they would help the creaters of 3rd party programs in making them undetectable.
